(mem,thds) ∈ ss ⇒ (∀fmap. bir_env_lookup "MEM8" mem = SOME (BVal_Mem Bit64 Bit8 fmap) ⇒ FLOOKUP fmap (w2n x) = SOME 2) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x5" (HD thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 2w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x5" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x8" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w))
